author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Park Street Nordicom A/S Updates On Capitalisation
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Park Street Nordicom A/S:
* REG-PARK STREET NORDICOM A/S: UPDATES ON CAPITALISATION
* ‍CASH INJECTION OF DKK 50,000,000.00 IN EXCHANGE OF COMPANY‘S CLASS B-SHARES WILL BE EXECUTED​
* ‍DEBT OF A NOMINAL AMOUNT OF DKK 92,688,795.04 CREDIT FACILITIES SHALL BE CONVERTED INTO CLASS B-SHARE CAPITAL​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
